case_body_condition: Not recognizable - Partial skeletal parts only
case_circumstances: On 10/12/1981, these skeletal remains were discovered in a vacant lot southeast of Russell Rd. and Sandhill Ave. The remains consist of the skull and mandible, cervical vertebra, thoracic vertebra, lumbar vertebra, both clavicles, both scapulae, sternum, both humeri, both radii, both femora, both tibia and right fibula. The area is occasionally inhabited by transient persons.
case_head_hair: Medium brown, straight to slightly curvy, very fine, 3" in length
fingerprints: Fingerprint information is currently not available
case_clothing_on_body: Brown shirt, greenish trousers, brown belt, blue pull-over sweatshirt
dental: Dental information / charting is available and entered
documents: There are currently no documents available for this case.
